item.title: Google CTF 2024 Grand Prix Heaven
item.description: This is my solution for Grand Prix Heaven from Google 2024 CTF. I particularly enjoyed this challenge because of its detail level; multiple little vulnerabilities had to be chained together to achieve XSS on the target.
